issue.title: [C++] Enable CSV writer to control the field delimiter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15672](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15672). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As reported on GitHub: https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/12413

There is no option to control the field delimiter when writing a CSV file.
